Muito Bom, 100% recomendado

Un gran juego con una historia muy atrapante y amplia que te introduce dentro del mundo y deja muchas cosas que pensar, te deja con ganas de saber que es lo que va a pasar, y te hace querer seguir avanzando hasta terminarlo. La dificultad de los niveles ha mejorado con respecto al primero y a pesar de que haya alguno que otro que te tome bastantes intentos aún asi te dan ganas de seguir intentando hasta lograrlo, los personajes están perfectamente bien hechos, cada uno de los pocos con un carisma y forma de ser única que te harán tanto reir como querer asesinarlos lenta y dolorosamente, lo recomiendo más que nada porque es un juego bastante fluido que te hará pasar unas buenas horas de juego entretenidas que valdrán la pena. La historia bastante desarrollada siempre te dejara con un hambre de una secuela, cosa que para VALVe siempre le fue muy dificil de hacer en caso de terceras partes... Aún asi, te cuentan las cosas de tal forma que te dejan a ti crear la historia y averiguar lo que esta pasando, es una aventura desafiante y entretenida pero para nada confusa o difícil, algo que es un gran atributo para este título. En fin, para resumir una larga lista de cosas que hacen a este juego una obra de arte serían su profuna y gran historia, y su capacidad para hacer funcionar tu cerebro y hacerte pensar de mejor manera como hacer las cosas para poder hacerlas bien. Su jugabilidad es bastante buena y simple, te adaptas rápidamente a los controles, en especial si has jugado su antecesor, y aunque no sea su particularidad más importante, su visualidad gráfica tambien es bastante buena.
A very fun game, if you like puzzels this is one of the best out there.
MindF**k for your brain !! :)

great co-op!
Like thinking? Like first person? Like awesome graphics? Portal 2 is the game for you! In Portal 2 you're solving puzzles with your portal gun which can help you teleport from one place to another.

Portal 2 is the revolutionary game of the logical games. Also sits on the throne of Cooperative games in my honest opinion.
The cooperative mode gives you the opportunity to have a good time only by using your brain, whether you play with strangers, friends or family!
Compared to the first, the singleplayer is much more developed, just as the gameplay and design.
It's worth the price!

nice

[strike]Easily the best game I've played so far this year[/strike]; all of the writing is excellent, especially the parts with Cave Johnson. The level design is very typical of Valve, very well executed and detailed with careful attention to even the littlest bits of foliage. The ending is apparently very easy to misinterpret, as I've seen quite a few people posting about how a sequel is inevitable but I really can't see that happening. Portal 2 actually wraps up the Aperture storyline quite nicely in my opinion, but we'll see.

The game is definitely pretty lengthy compared to the first one, sporting two separate campaigns; Valve has publicly stated that the single player campaign is three times the length of the original, while the campaign for the co-op times at about twice the length of the original; having five times the content at a little over double the price seems like a very fair and generous trade off to me :)

Great game. Love the music and sound effects, the storyline, the voice acting, the environments.
Just....wow

In this update to the franchise, they finally correct the typo the made when titling the first one. Not many people know this, but there actually were TWO (2) portals in the first game, despite the VERY misleading title "Portal" I'm glad that they have decided to be more transparent when making the title for this one, actually giving the real number of portals in the game.
one of the best games of the genaration buy it now and one of my top ten fav games of all time,anyway amazing game if you don't already own it go buy it now.

I am from China. This is the first time I bought a game on Steam. Portal 2 is really fun!
This is a fantastic game and way better than the first one in most cases. First of all the game now has a story! And not just any story a pretty good one. And yea there was a bit story in the end of the first game, but in the start it wasn't really anything but test solving. Speaking about the tests they've also become way more interesting and challenging than in the first game. There have been added lots of new things to make the game more interesting like gels and lasers. Besides that the game also has a co-op mode, which is extremely fun to play with your freinds, especially when you're just trolling each other. And lastly the "jokes" or rather insults that GlaDos come up with are so much fun in this game and really adds the missing component to make this one of the best games ever.
Fucking best ending.  Loved the game
这是一部非常棒的游戏，在我第一次接触steam时，可以找到怎么好玩的游戏，真可以说是幸运。游戏的画面和音效方面做的很好，每个关卡都有很大的挑战性。这是一款不容错过的好游戏。
This game is the best
Portal 2 has a great storyline, and you can play any map you want from the workshop.  I would recomend this game.

Honestly if you have a PC and you don't have this game on your hard drive, you're nuts. I remember be crazy excited hearing this game was coming out after playing the first Portal and my inticipation was met with one of the best sequels I've ever played. Characters are great (and funny). Gameplay is even better than the first with more mechanics and 2 player (although you have to use developer console to get split screen multiplayer to work with keyboard mouse for one player and Xbox controller for another). Anyway you can't go wrong with this game unless you don't like puzzles or good games.
This was a pretty fun game.  I had never played Portal but it was easy to get up to speed and move through the game.

This is an incredible puzzle game. Its unique control set an teleportation ideas is very fascinating and anyone who enjoys a clever challenge will enjoy this game. I had problems installing this game, but I have an older model computer. Once I exited the game, I was not able to run it again without reinstalling it. So I left it on all the time, hence the 286 hours of gameplay. The story is ok, but thats the point of the game. I have not been able to get the multiplayer to work either, but again, thats just my computer. I would love to play this on a console.
